attributes.action: catagorically state that British troops will not be used in a US led invasion of Iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent US rhetoric could lead us to believe that the build up of US troops in Iraq is a precursor to a US led invasion of Iran. This would surely be a terrible mistake and I call on the Prime Minister to state that British troops will not be drawn any further into Bush’s discredited ‘War on Terror’.
